pref.name: isMonitoringMode
pref.description: Enable/disable time's monitoring

pref.name: tSlowAfterAuto
pref.description: duration to stay at slow speed after being turned in auto (give enough time to the operator to evacuate the rack)

pref.name: lowSpeedAfterAuto
pref.description: speed at which the truck is limited for the tSlowAfterAuto duration (after switching to auto)

pref.name: isUnderInitialLift
pref.description: Is the laser located under initial lift (if any doubt, should the laser be inhibited when the initial lift is down ?) If your truck is not equipped with an initial lift, please keep it to default (0)

pref.name: isBlindWhenForksDown
pref.description: Can the field of vision of your rear laser be obstructed by the backrest or the forks/load in any way. If set to 1, the truck will lift its forks above safety/design/minHeightRearSafetyEnabled when necessary. If your truck is not equipped with a rearLaser, please keep it to default

pref.name: isUnderInitialLift
pref.description: Is the laser located under initial lift (if any doubt, should the laser be inhibited when the initial lift is down ?) If your truck is not equipped with an initial lift, please keep it to default (0)

pref.name: isBlindWhenForksDown
pref.description: Can the field of vision of your rear right laser be obstructed by the backrest or the forks/load in any way. If set to 1, the truck will lift its forks above safety/design/minHeightRearSafetyEnabled when necessary. If your truck is not equipped with a rearLaser, please keep it to default

pref.name: isUnderInitialLift
pref.description: Is the laser located under initial lift (if any doubt, should the laser be inhibited when the initial lift is down ?) If your truck is not equipped with an initial lift, please keep it to default (0)

pref.name: isBlindWhenForksDown
pref.description: Can the field of vision of your rear left laser be obstructed by the backrest or the forks/load in any way. If set to 1, the truck will lift its forks above safety/design/minHeightRearSafetyEnabled when necessary. If your truck is not equipped with a rearLaser, please keep it to default

pref.name: isBlindWhenForksDown
pref.description: Can the field of vision of your rear mobile laser be obstructed by the backrest or the forks/load in any way. If set to 1, the truck will lift its forks above safety/design/minHeightRearSafetyEnabled when necessary. If your truck is not equipped with a rearLaser, please keep it to default

pref.name: enable
pref.description: Enable 3D perception with RoboSense and Perceval

pref.name: maxAngleForCorrectDetection
pref.description: maximum angle between the truck and the rack to observe to consider the cam3D results can be exploited

pref.name: scenarios
pref.description: List of scenario to apply (alteration to the detection param) in order to search the beam Possible values are : sideShift+, sideShift-, forksUp, forksDown, beamFocus+, beamFocus-

pref.name: maxNbOfTryPerScenario
pref.description: Maximum retry number before moving to the next scenario

pref.name: enableAdjustmentDeltaX
pref.description: Enable correction of the X-axis with Beam3D results

pref.name: maxDeltaXAllowed
pref.description: Maximum difference allowed between expected X-axis position and Beam3D results

pref.name: enableAdjustmentDeltaZ
pref.description: Enable correction of the height with Beam3D results

pref.name: maxDeltaZAllowed
pref.description: Maximum difference allowed between expected height position and Beam3D results

pref.name: heightGroundForScanPal
pref.description: Camera height for detecting a pallet on the ground

pref.name: scenarios
pref.description: List of scenario to apply (alteration to the detection param) in order to search the pallet Possible values are : sideShift+, sideShift-, forksUp, forksDown, palletFocus+, palletFocus-

pref.name: maxNbOfTryPerScenario
pref.description: Maximum retry number before moving to the next scenario

pref.name: enableAdjustmentDeltaX
pref.description: Enable correction of the X-axis with Pallet3D results

pref.name: maxDeltaXAllowed
pref.description: Maximum difference allowed between expected X-axis position and Pallet3D results

pref.name: maxDeltaYAllowed
pref.description: Max distance between the center of the forks and the center of the pallet to pick.

pref.name: enableAdjustmentDeltaZ
pref.description: Enable correction of the height with Pallet3D results

pref.name: maxDeltaZAllowed
pref.description: Maximum difference allowed between expected height position and Pallet3D results

pref.name: cam3DHeightForScan
pref.description: height of the camera (relative to the pallet height in the rack) to run the lateral freeSpace detection. (could potentially be negative)

pref.name: heightGroundForFreeSpace
pref.description: Camera height for detecting a freeSpace on the ground

pref.name: maxValToBeConsideredIn
pref.description: (on Reach Trucks only) maximum value of the retract sensor to consider the slipsheet to be fully retracted (threshold beyond which the flexisoft inductive sensor is deactivated)

pref.name: intermediateStop
pref.description: (on Reach Trucks only) The most inner SETPOINT of the reach mast that does not trigger the PLd inductive sensor (to be used in 2 steps reach in).

pref.name: frkHeightMiniWithReachIn
pref.description: (for reach trucks with side bumpers only) Minimum height of the forks to reach in (otherwise, the pallet might push against the rollers

pref.name: frkHeightBaseTruckInductive
pref.description: Forks threshold above which the base truck start acting differently (truck is slowed even in manual and initial lift is blocked)

pref.name: enabled
pref.description: enable/disable automatic forks lowering when moving at high speed (necessary on some trucks to reach max speed)

pref.name: speedThreshold
pref.description: speed limitation if forks are not lowered

pref.name: forksLevelAtHighSpeed
pref.description: forks height allowing maximum speed

pref.name: triggerMargin
pref.description: offset on speed threshold to prevent the forks from moving up and down endlessly if target speed

pref.name: allowedDuringTravel
pref.description: Defines robot behaviour during LI movement

list.value: Truck may not move during LI movement and during 5s after the LI movement
Truck may move during LI movement and speed limit ends 5s after the LI movement
Truck may move during LI movement and speed limit ends 0s after the LI movement

pref.name: minForSmallDistance
pref.description: Minimum distance needed to call the function goToSmallDistance()

pref.name: minimumRearHardwareSafety
pref.description: Distance between the software (static) safety field and the smallest hardware safety field.

pref.name: dslow_tooHigh
pref.description: Distance to a dangerous zone with lower roof where AGV starts to slow down if its forks are too high

pref.name: dstop_tooHigh
pref.description: Distance to a dangerous zone with lower roof where AGV starts to slow down if its forks are too high

pref.name: isRearSafetyLaserOnTheForks
pref.description: Is there a safety laser on the forks (ex : L12LHP 360° safety)

pref.name: LIupWhenTravellingEmpty
pref.description: Set at 0 to force robot to travel empty with its LI down (Only necessary for truck equipped with initial lift).

pref.name: sideBumper
pref.description: (Only necessary for reach trucks).is the truck expected to carry loads that are bigger than the space between its 2 rollers

pref.name: minHeightRearSafetyEnabled
pref.description: Minimum height for the vertical forks to make sure the forks or the bottom of the load will not be visible by the rear safety (rear / rear right / rear left laser)

pref.name: maxHeightOkForMovement
pref.description: Maximum height to authorize the robot to move at full speed right after an evacuation. If forks are higher, robot will stop and wait for forks to be at a more reasonable height

pref.name: extraEvacDist
pref.description: Extra distance after evac allowed to robot for moving its forks while travelling

pref.name: distDetectionPal
pref.description: How far must an obstacle be placed to consider there is a palette on the forks (when using any center rangefinder as a palet sensor)

pref.name: blindZoneLength
pref.description: Distance below which the the center rangefinder value is not changing (blind zone of the sensor)

pref.name: slidingDetectionErrThreshold
pref.description: maximum difference between the rangefinder value and the odometry value in the checkSlidingPallet thread

pref.name: moduleName
pref.description: name of the laser use to run the scanning for the height

pref.name: frameBuffer
pref.description: number of frame from the laser to start looking if obstacle are inside the spot

pref.name: thresholdDetection
pref.description: In pourcentage of framebuffer how many time there was a hit inside the polygone to consider the slot as not empty

pref.name: outputIds
pref.description: GPIO physical outputs to handle

pref.name: GPIO_ANumES
pref.description: Linked to GPIO_output/outputIds (same size). Output physical location (should be either "GPIO" or "ANumES").

pref.name: defaultStates
pref.description: Linked to GPIO_output/outputIds (same size). Default state eof each output (should be either 0 or 1).

pref.name: callbacks
pref.description: Linked to GPIO_output/outputIds (same size). Callback called to know in which state should the output be set to (Careful, called very often) proto : [0 or 1] = cbk()

pref.name: inputIds
pref.description: GPIO physical inputs to handle

pref.name: GPIO_ANumES
pref.description: Linked to GPIO_inputs/inputIds (same size). Inputs physical location (should be either "GPIO" or "ANumES").

pref.name: defaultStates
pref.description: Linked to GPIO_inputs/inputIds (same size). Default state eof each output (should be either 0 or 1).

pref.name: setCallbacks
pref.description: Linked to GPIO_inputs/inputIds (same size). Callback called when the input is set (value becomes different from default state) (Careful, called very often) Leave an empty value in the table if you're only interesting in having an action triggered when the input is reset (to keep the same size as inputIds) proto : cbk()

pref.name: resetCallbacks
pref.description: Linked to GPIO_inputs/inputIds (same size). Callback called when the input is reset (value becomes equal to default state) (Careful, called very often) Leave an empty value in the table if you're only interesting in having an action triggered when the input is set (to keep the same size as inputIds) proto : cbk()

pref.name: lowLoadThreshold
pref.description: Number of (average) robot available over time to be considered as in low activity. If more robot are available, then activity is considered low. (can be decimal)

pref.name: highLoadThreshold
pref.description: Number of (average) robot available over time to be considered as in high activity. If less robot are available, then activity is considered high. (can be decimal)

pref.name: numberOfChargers
pref.description: maximum number of simultaneous battery missions allowed in this mode

pref.name: batteryThreshold
pref.description: Battery level to trigger a battery mission in this mode

pref.name: numberOfChargers
pref.description: maximum number of simultaneous battery missions allowed in this mode

pref.name: batteryThreshold
pref.description: Battery level to trigger a battery mission in this mode

pref.name: numberOfChargers
pref.description: maximum number of simultaneous battery missions allowed in this mode

pref.name: batteryThreshold
pref.description: Battery level to trigger a battery mission in this mode

pref.name: aisleWidth
pref.description: Aisle width for the current VNA

pref.name: errorCaseCannotInit
pref.description: Behavior to adopt when truck cannot reset its forks (if too close from / inside the rack)

list.value: Robot will autoamtically restart its current mission (and potentially force an evac obstacle)

pref.name: maxWeightEmpty
pref.description: Maximum weight to be read on the sensor to consider the forks are empty. This value should be high enough to consider the weight of the forks/backrest themselves.

pref.name: maxWeightCarry
pref.description: Maximum weight to be read on the sensor which is safe to carry. This value should be high enough to consider the weight of the forks/backrest on top of the wieght of the load.

pref.name: activateBeep
pref.description: Activation of AGV Beeps

pref.name: customBeepInReverse
pref.description: Activate custom beeping pattern while AGV moves in reverse (standard for US)

pref.name: flashWhileManualEStop
pref.description: Activate custom flashing pattern while AGV has a manual E-stop activated

pref.name: missionType
pref.description: Type of battery mission to be used. Select autoCharge for mission where the truck is charged automatically. Select manualCharge for missions where the truck goes to a point to be manually charged by an operator (or to have its battery changed).

pref.name: nbTry
pref.description: Number of try reading barcode before managing error case

pref.name: filteredSize
pref.description: Number of character of the barcode to test

pref.name: forksMaximumHeight
pref.description: forks height max

pref.name: auxiliaryMastHeightIdle
pref.description: auxiliary mast height idle

pref.name: minDetectionHeight
pref.description: min distance for the camera above the ground

pref.name: cmdAllowedRetractOut
pref.description: Safety: Vertical forks height command allowed when the retract is out

pref.name: cmdAllowedForksFront
pref.description: Safety: Vertical forks height command allowed when the forks are at front position

pref.name: maxLoadHeight
pref.description: Highest load that can be handled by the AGVs in the project

pref.name: maxBackrestHeight
pref.description: No VNA trucks: Distance from top of the forks to the top of the backrest or highest module if anything is above

pref.name: cabinHighestDist
pref.description: VNA only: Distance from the top of the cabin or highest module if anything is above (ex.mast camera) to the cabin reference (where our feet touch when we are in the cabin)

pref.name: firstMastHeightGround
pref.description: VNA only: Distance from the top of first mast to the ground

pref.name: auxMastHeightToCam
pref.description: VNA only: Maximum auxiliary mast height so that the load or the highest point of mast don't surpass the highest point of the cabin

pref.name: stopDistToZoneForksHigh
pref.description: VNA only: the distance to a height limit zone to stop and wait for the forks lowering if the forks are higher than the limited height, to avoid the VNA approching the zone with forks high which then will triger an ES by HEIGHT LIMIT thread

pref.name: isAnticipAllowedForward
pref.description: Is forks anticipation allowed when the robot is going forward ? 1: allowed, 0: not allowed

pref.name: isAnticipAllowedDuringTurn
pref.description: Is forks anticipation allowed when the robot is turning after rpkBeforeLastReverse ? 1: allowed, 0: not allowed

pref.name: isAnticipAllowedAfterTurn
pref.description: Is forks anticipation allowed when the robot has finished last turn and is reaching rpkApproch ? 1: allowed, 0: not allowed

pref.name: forwardAnticipationDistance
pref.description: The distance between where the robot can start forks anticipation to rpkBeforeLastReverse if anticipation is allowed in forward

pref.name: distFromRpkIFOSToAllowAnticip
pref.description: distance from rpk where the robot is in front of slot for further actions to where forks anticipation is allowed

pref.name: forksHeightSpeedLimited
pref.description: VNA only: the vertical forks height above which the speed is limited by base truck

pref.name: distFromReverseToAllowFrkMvt
pref.description: Distance before the next backward movement where AGV will start moving the forks

pref.name: distFromReverseToPreventFrkMvt
pref.description: Minimum distance of the next backward movement to allow the AGV to lower the forks. Will avoid mutlpiple fork movements. Only in forward movement

pref.name: generalRotationLimitedHeight
pref.description: VNA only: Forks height under which forks rotation is allowed

pref.name: rotationLimitedZone
pref.description: VNA only: Zones name where the forks rotation is allowed only when forks are lower than a given height.

pref.name: rotationLimitedHeightByZone
pref.description: VNA only: Forks height limit in zone under which rotation is allowed

pref.name: stopVNA
pref.description: VNA only: the list of CAN error which will be added in AddCanErrToList

pref.name: eStopList
pref.description: List of CAN error which will be added in AddCanErrToListAU
